summary: Medicare is trying to save money and improve health care quality by using value-based payment models, which encourage doctors to do things like use electronic health records to better track and evaluate patient care. But are small and rural physician practices prepared for such a transition? We found, for example, that some of these practices have small budgets, making it harder for them to invest...
title: Medicare Value-Based Payment Models: Participation Challenges and Available Assistance for Small and Rural Practices
